summary: Implemented Pharmacovigilance & AE Alerting Agent with real-time safety monitoring and multi-channel alerting

features_implemented: Safety rules engine with keyword and pattern matching
Multi-source data stream processing (EDC, patient apps, call center)
Real-time safety event detection with confidence scoring
Configurable alert severity and recipient mapping
Comprehensive safety event and alert logging
Structured data models for safety monitoring
safety_capabilities: Immediate alert escalation for critical events
details.test_coverage: Comprehensive unit tests covering all safety monitoring functions and alert mechanisms
details.compliance: Follows all project standards for configuration, logging, LLM interaction, and testing
